localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

blogPost.title:
I keep seeing ppl talking about the “Buffett indicator” that clearly shows we’re in a bubble

Munger said a few years ago Buffett doesn’t believe in this thing anymore https://t.co/I1Zj8DxL1H
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
我一直看到人们在谈论 "巴菲特指标"，这清楚地表明我们正处于泡沫之中。

芒格几年前就说过巴菲特不相信这个东西了https://t.co/I1Zj8DxL1H。

我一直看到人們在談論 "巴菲特指標"，這清楚地表明我們正處於泡沫之中。

芒格幾年前就說過巴菲特不相信這個東西了https://t.co/I1Zj8DxL1H。
